name: A Garden in the Sea
description:
Made in Unity in 40 hours for "Invictvs Game Jam", organized by Fabmaq.

Theme: Lucky Shot

Credits:

  • Game Design - @edgarajesus
  • Programming - @FredTSousa
  • Programming - @JorgeGameDev
  • Low Poly Art - @fifsilva
  • Sound Design - @TRodriguesMusic

How to play:

  • Left analog for movement
  • Right analog for direction
  • Left Trigger to dash
  • Right Trigger to Shoot
Notes:
  • Hitting an enemy in any body part does damage, but hitting it's (blue) core, instantly kills him, and let's your projectile pass through, possibly hitting another enemy behind. 
  • The three paths, after each combat phase, are randomly placed. One leads to misfortune, one provides a reward, the other just leads to your destination. You must choose. If you fall to misfortune, know that your previous options are not the same, as they have been randomly generated once more.
  • You may encounter bugs and lack of polish (it is a game jam game afterall...).
  • Game controller required to play
